tweet: We've begun pushing Haskell Cardano 1.0 to the relays and after the OBFT hardfork to the Core nodes. It's a major milestone. Check it out:  https://t.co/YwtE8EM784  https://t.co/xQ4G07sDl8  https://t.co/8Q1PGAFgwQ some of the Haskell code ever written. Proud of the team  https://t.co/BBXpwf8H46

We've now scheduled the balance snapshot for the Shelley Incentivized Testnet. 29th November 12 noon UTC. Make sure you are holding your ada in Daedalus or Yoroi on that day to take part:  https://t.co/Qu0NdgQSKt #Shelley #Cardano #CardanoCommunity  https://t.co/y7V6WlOcQJ

Finally happy with the particle movement on this map of #cardano #shelley nodes. Using the mouse direction vector and velocity to influence the particles makes all the difference. Live link coming soon...  #webgl #javascript #threejs  @InputOutputHK  https://t.co/hTh9x2yBNA

Hi! In recent days we have been sharing safety tips to avoid scams and bad actors within the #Cardano and #crypto ecosystem. Beware of suspicious Direct Messages (DMs) on Telegram and impersonators. More info:  https://t.co/IFLabUFPOd  https://t.co/JglhCVn4rp

#Yoroi will support the #Cardano snapshot tentatively scheduled for Nov. 29th.  Once this snapshot takes place, Yoroi will be updated. Users will then be able to perform a balance check to ensure that their funds were correctly included during the Nov. 29th snapshot.

Alright, chart updates will be posted on;   - $VRA - $ZIL  - $VET - $ADA

$ADA #CARDANO  This one is still hanging around here, but as long as 480 holds, we can start attacking the upper range resistance at 530-540.  Breaking that and this can start moving as well.  https://t.co/Zw2m3ZBW2A

To be honest there is no public #blockchain that would be ready for mass adoption. If a network does not process cheaply at least a few thousands of transactions per second then user experience is terrible.  #Cardano will be the first blockchain ready for real adoption.  https://t.co/eOjhWsF8Ft

@IOHK_Charles visited @noveltycurve in #Dubai to discuss a future collaborative partnership with #cardano. Here, Charles speaks at #decentralised impromptu meet-up in Dubai #blockchaindubai #blockchainuae  https://t.co/B0lRktR4pp

We have updated our article about preparing for the #Cardano second #Shelley test-net #snapshot.  You basically need to move #ADA into temporary main-net #Daedalus or #Yoroi wallet BEFORE the 29 of November.  Read more:  https://t.co/XSjvLs31qD

Cryptocurrencies are risky. Also a big opportunity. Investments are about risk/reward. @Cardano supporters are extraordinarily fortunate that a $BTC pullback is corresponding with the Shelley testnet launch. $ADA price is lower while major milestones are hit. #CardanoBlackFriday

My deposit arrived. I'm not buying yet, missed the 6500 yesterday.  Many good alts, with higher upside than BTC, made new lows yesterday.  I'm splitting my deposit and buying equal parts of $BTC, $ETH, $ADA, $XLM, $ICX  My buys wait at the double bottom. Let's see what I catch.
🚨Get all your $ADA into Daedalus or Yoroi to be counted in the final snapshot before the staking testnet begins. There are no plans for a third snapshot so make this one count!🚨

Trolls cry "he's out traveling the world" reality is Charles continues to work his ass off - meeting with heads of state, companies, communities, meetups, etc. to deliver collaborative partnerships, use cases & a pipeline of projects for the Cardano ecosystem. Thank you Charles!
The second #Cardano #Shelley #testnet snapshot could be on 29 November.   I will refresh my article about staking and tweet it tomorrow.

It's always good to push the extremes and find the limits. Innovation occurs at the edge of failure. This solar powered Cardano node by @markusgufler is a good example of pushing lowest limits of power consumption.
